content: Write a paragraph about spring, ensuring each word starts with 's'.

Spring's splendid sunrise spreads serene splendor, saturating surroundings with soft, shimmering sunlight. Sprightly songbirds serenade, singing sweet, soulful melodies that soothe souls. Scents of springtime strawberries and sweet-smelling flowers stimulate senses, sparking sentiments of serenity and satisfaction. Stark snowscape slowly surrenders to sprouting shoots, symbolizing survival and steady growth. Social activities spring up, showcasing shared smiles and stories, strengthening social bonds. Overall, spring symbolizes renewal,生机与希望。
